class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 3 - July 28, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Summer (Vienna). Intensive study of Austrian culture within a historical framework. Lectures and discussions concern history, art, architecture, music, literature, and everyday life. For full details, see special brochure published annually.
